translations: n.马拉松赛跑；马拉松式的活动（或工作）
adj.马拉松式的，漫长而累人的
v.参加马拉松赛跑（或马拉松式的比赛、活动）

sentences.sentence: Avoid learning marathons—they do not make the best use of your mind.
sentences.translation: 避免学习马拉松——它们不能充分利用你的头脑。

sentences.sentence: Avoid learning marathons. They do not make the best use of your mind.
sentences.translation: 避免马拉松式的学习。这样的学习不能充分利用记忆力。

sentences.sentence: There is no point saying you run marathons, if you are going to be out of breath arriving at the interview on the second floor.
sentences.translation: 如果你跑到二楼面试都喘不过气来，那么你说你常跑马拉松就毫无意义了。
